lead_paragraph: For those looking to get a leg up in their Oscar pool, a program showcasing this year's Oscar-nominated shorts is now in more than 200 theaters around the country. It includes the nominees in the animated, live-action and documentary shorts categories. Our colleague Stephen Holden reviewed all three programs and wrote that "there is no dearth of troubling subject matter" in the series, particularly in the documentary category. "But each has a silver lining," he added.

headline.main: A Brief Look at Oscar-Nominated Shorts
